long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1688 Search by Image chrome extension simplifies your shopping experience by allowing you to find similar products by simply uploading an image.  
 

Key Features: 


>> Image-Based Product Discovery: Effortlessly find similar products on 1688.com by uploading an image of the item you desire. 

>> Taobaoâ„¢ Coupons Display: Access exclusive 1688.com coupons, making your shopping experience both exciting and economical.  

>> Seamless Link Copying: Quickly copy product links from 1688.com for sharing or later reference with the integrated copy link button. 

>> Capture and Translate Text: Snap a photo and efficiently translate text from images, breaking down language barriers for seamless communication. 

>> Multi-Language Translation: Translate text from your native language into Chinese, ensuring clarity in your search. 

>> Image Download and Export: Easily download product images and videos from 1688.com and export image links for sharing, or for translation. 

>> Expansive Compatibility: Our extension supports compatibility with other platforms, offering a versatile shopping experience. 

>> Product Comparison and Export: Compare similar products and export your findings to Excel for an organized shopping decision. 

  

How to Use 1688 Search by Image?  

>> Upload Your Image or get a similar product on 1688.com based on your uploaded image.  

>> Use the copy link button to quickly copy product links for sharing or future reference.  

>> Enter your native language in the search box for instant translations into Chinese.  

>> Download product images and videos from 1688.com and export image links for sharing or translation.
